name: Kaeya
desc: A thinker in the Knights of Favonius with a somewhat exotic appearance.

elemSkill.name: Frostgnaw
elemSkill.desc: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in front of Kaeya.\n\nKaeya seems affable, but his nature is that of unyielding ice.

elemBurst.name: Glacial Waltz
elemBurst.desc: Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him. These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to opponents in their path for the ability's duration. A winsome smile, genial words, and the merciless hoarfrost that lies beneath... These are all Kaeya's weapons.

attackSkill.name: Normal Attack: Ceremonial Bladework
attackSkill.desc:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

c13ns.name: Excellent Blood
c13ns.desc: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

c13ns.name: Never-Ending Performance
c13ns.desc: Every time <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

c13ns.name: Dance of Frost
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Frozen Kiss
c13ns.desc:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

c13ns.name: Frostbiting Embrace
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Glacial Whirlwind
c13ns.desc: <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.
